name: StoryTeller
short_description:
StoryTeller has been written for those who like to listen to a book or some music when going to bed.

Thanks to its auto-rewind feature you'll never miss a part of your book as StoryTeller will simply rewind to the last point you successfully indicated you were still awake, at least to a certain degree.

When StoryTeller beeps that means you have to shake the hell out of your phone to signify you are still, more or less actively, listening. Doing so successfully will reset the timer.

In order to able to collect a lot of mostly meaningless data and also have a rough idea on how many people might be using StoryTeller I am using Google Analytics. This is disabled by default and you will be asked on the first start whether or not you would like to enable tracking. After that you always have the option to enable or disable Google Analytics through the settings.
summary: Android AudioBook player with sleep timeout
